summary: Most core pages/routes and a shared layout were added, along with a Motoko backend actor and frontend hooks for submitting/fetching custom orders. However, several requirements cannot be confirmed or appear not to match the spec exactly (notably exact text formatting for prices/descriptions and required generated icon assets). The diff also introduces unrequested Internet Identity/auth scaffolding and an extra caffeine.ai attribution link in the footer.

missing_requirements.requirement: Bookmark Collection page must render the starting price exactly as “Starting Price – ₹49” and the provided description exactly as provided.
missing_requirements.reason: The page shows “Starting Price” as a title and “₹49” in a separate badge, not the exact combined string “Starting Price – ₹49”. The description text present cannot be verified to match the exact provided description.

missing_requirements.requirement: Customized Card Collection page must render the price exactly as “Price – ₹250” and the provided description exactly as provided.
missing_requirements.reason: The page shows “Price” as a title and “₹250” in a separate badge, not the exact combined string “Price – ₹250”. The description text present cannot be verified to match the exact provided description.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated icon assets (favicon + app icons) under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them so the browser tab icon is set.
missing_requirements.reason: No generated icon image files under frontend/public/assets/generated are shown in the diff summary. While the file summary mentions icon references in frontend/index.html, the required generated assets themselves are not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication scaffolding (provider/hooks) added, implying user login/auth support.
hallucinated_features.reason: User accounts/authentication were explicitly listed as a non-goal; the diff adds Internet Identity integration and identity-based actor creation logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an unrequested caffeine.ai attribution/UTM link (“Built with … using caffeine.ai”).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only requested an Instagram link, contact email text, and the line “Made with Love by DESVA” in the footer; the caffeine.ai promotional link is additional functionality/content not requested.
